rules.impl: (state, events) => { if (events.some(e => e.tag === 'INCREMENT')) { state.context.count += 1; return [{ tag: 'Incremented', payload: {} }]; } return []; }
(state, events) => { if (events.some(e => e.tag === 'DECREMENT')) { state.context.count -= 1; return [{ tag: 'Decremented', payload: {} }]; } return []; }
